title: Life Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: Located inside Rainbow Blossom in the heart of St Matthews. The juice bar and retail space offers organic and vegetarian products. Smoothies, tonics, juices, superfood, bulk items, raw vegan chocolate, and other health foods. Community fellowship in a health-conscious bar atmosphere.
